definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

pinyin: Ou1 zhou1 Zi4 you2 Mao4 yi4 Lian2 meng2

sentences.english: The Japanese government worries their country is lagging behind in terms of FTAs.
sentences.chinese: 日本政府擔心日本會在自由貿易協議方面被甩在後面。

sentences.english: However, Norway is a member of the much  smaller European Free Trade Association (EFTA).
sentences.chinese: 同時，挪威也是更小的歐洲自由貿易協會的成員國。

sentences.english: He often pamphleteers and lectures in favour of free trade.
sentences.chinese: 他經常講演及寫小冊子支持自由貿易。

sentences.english: These economic benefits were made possible in large part because both China and the United States embraced freer trade.
sentences.chinese: 這些高增產率得益於中美雙方的自由貿易。

sentences.english: An anti-free trade protester stands in front of the Japanese Embassy in Bangkok, April 3, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 反自由貿易的抗議者站在泰國曼谷的日本大使館前。

sentences.english: The free port is the development goal of the bonded harbor in the east of Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 自由貿易港區是天津東疆保稅港區的發展目標。

sentences.english: But when has the west ever thought that free trade was harmful for Africa?
sentences.chinese: 然而西方國家幾時考慮過自由貿易給非洲帶來的損害？

sentences.english: The trouble is that China has never really accepted the basic rules of fair trade.
sentences.chinese: 麻煩在於，中國從不真正遵守自由貿易的基本準則。

sentences.english: Such are the fruits of free-trade ideology.
sentences.chinese: 這是自由貿易思想的結果。

sentences.english: There was a longstanding controversy between the salt dealer monopoly system and free trade system.
sentences.chinese: 鹽業引岸專商制度與自由貿易制度之爭由來已久。

sentences.english: No one believes Myanmar is about to roll out the welcome mat for free markets.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人相信緬甸即將打開的自由貿易的市場。

sentences.english: Our policy called for free trade .
sentences.chinese: 我們的政策主張自由貿易。

sentences.english: Last year India signed a major free-trade deal with Asean.
sentences.chinese: 去年印度同東盟簽下了一項重要的自由貿易協議。

sentences.english: The United States and Canada have signed a free-trade pact.
sentences.chinese: 美國和加拿大簽署了自由貿易條約。

sentences.english: When we embrace free trade, you blame us for taking away your jobs.
sentences.chinese: 當我們擁抱自由貿易時，卻被責罵搶走了你們的飯碗。

sentences.english: Figure 2.9 provides and example of the logistics-oriented FTZ concept.
sentences.chinese: 下圖爲物流型自由貿易園區的概念示例。

definition: preparedness/to bring sth to a state of readiness
to establish/to found/to create (a good environment)
Central Bank of the Republic of China (Taiwan)
